name: Project 47 (itch)
description:
So you know the prototype of FNF? Well, I remade it and here it is.

And its also like those FNF test character games.

Alright time for credits

- [ninjamuffin99](https://twitter.com/ninja_muffin99) - Programmer - [PhantomArcade3K](https://twitter.com/phantomarcade3k) and [Evilsk8r](https://twitter.com/evilsk8r) - Art - [Kawaisprite](https://twitter.com/kawaisprite) - Musician -[MtH](https://twitter.com/MtH13208)

Sunday By bbpanzu-VS Sunday [Remastered] [Friday Night Funkin'] [Mods] (gamebanana.com)

You can play the original prototype here.. Friday Night Funkin' (Ludum Dare Prototype) by ninjamuffin99 (itch.io)

Home Depot version of Ugh- [SiIvaGunner] Ugh - Friday Night Funkin' - YouTube

C.O.N.T.R.O.L.S

Press up, down, left and right to control player1

Press WASD to control  player2

Pressing X or C changes the camera

The combo and hey animation can be shown by pressing H.

More stuff like the game over screen and mods will be added soon.

Also the desktop version doesn't let you move the camera  and im still trying to fix that....

So yeah enjoy :)
